message: Implement a check for invalid inputs (non-numeric values).
Handle cases where one of the numbers is zero.
Optimize this function to handle large values more efficiently.
Add a check for null or undefined values.
Consider performance optimization for very large arrays.
The subtraction logic is incorrect for negative numbers.
The error handling for division by zero is not properly implemented.
Refactor the function to handle cases where the input is not a string.
Add error handling for failed network requests.
